      <script>
        const activeClassNameSoftwareSlider1 = 'software-slider1-active';
        let currentSlideIndexSoftwareSlider1 = 0;

        function renderSoftwareSlider1(index, allSlideItems, paginationContainerEl) {
            allSlideItems.forEach(item => {
                item.classList.remove(activeClassNameSoftwareSlider1);
            });

            const targetSlideElement = allSlideItems[index];

            if (targetSlideElement) {
                targetSlideElement.classList.add(activeClassNameSoftwareSlider1);
            }
            updateActivePillSoftwareSlider1(index, paginationContainerEl);
        }
        
        function createPaginationSoftwareSlider1(paginationContainerEl, allSlideItems) {
            allSlideItems.forEach((slideItem, index) => {
                const pillText = slideItem.dataset.pillText || `Slide ${index + 1}`;
                const pill = document.createElement('div');
                pill.classList.add('software-slider1-pill');
                pill.dataset.index = index; 
                
                const pillTextSpan = document.createElement('span');
                pillTextSpan.textContent = pillText;
                pill.appendChild(pillTextSpan);
                
                paginationContainerEl.appendChild(pill); 

                pill.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    if (currentSlideIndexSoftwareSlider1 !== index) { 
                        currentSlideIndexSoftwareSlider1 = index;
                        renderSoftwareSlider1(currentSlideIndexSoftwareSlider1, allSlideItems, paginationContainerEl);
                    }
                });
            });
        }

        function updateActivePillSoftwareSlider1(activeIndex, paginationContainerEl) {
            const pills = paginationContainerEl.querySelectorAll('.software-slider1-pill');
            pills.forEach((pill, index) => {
                pill.classList.toggle(activeClassNameSoftwareSlider1, index === activeIndex);
            });
        }

        function initSoftwareSlider1() {
            const paginationContainerEl = document.getElementById('softwareSlider1PaginationContainer');
            const allSlidesWrapperEl = document.getElementById('softwareSlider1AllSlidesWrapper');

            if (!paginationContainerEl || !allSlidesWrapperEl) {
                console.warn('Software Slider 1: Essential container elements not found. Slider not initialized.');
                return;
            }
            
            const allSlideItems = allSlidesWrapperEl.querySelectorAll('.software-slider1-item');

            if (!allSlideItems.length) {
                 console.warn('Software Slider 1: No slide items found. Slider not initialized.');
                return;
            }

            createPaginationSoftwareSlider1(paginationContainerEl, allSlideItems);
            renderSoftwareSlider1(currentSlideIndexSoftwareSlider1, allSlideItems, paginationContainerEl); 
        }

        if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initSoftwareSlider1);
        } else {
            initSoftwareSlider1();
        }
    </script>

    <script>
    (function() { 
        let sliderContentEl, sliderTrackEl, paginationActiveBarEl, paginationSegmentsClickable;
        let actualPagesCount = 0; 
        let currentPageIndex = 0; 
        let currentTrackIndex = 1; 
        let isDragging = false;
        let startX, currentX, initialTrackX = 0;
        const dragThreshold = 50; 
        
        function getSliderWidth() {
            if (!sliderContentEl) { 
                return 0;
            }
            return sliderContentEl.offsetWidth; 
        }

        function setupSlider() {
            sliderContentEl = document.getElementById('single-image-caption-slider-content');
            sliderTrackEl = document.getElementById('single-image-caption-slider-track');
            paginationActiveBarEl = document.getElementById('single-image-caption-slider-pagination-active-bar');
            paginationSegmentsClickable = document.querySelectorAll('.single-image-caption-slider-pagination-segment-clickable');

            if (!sliderContentEl || !sliderTrackEl ) {
                return;
            }
            
            const initialItemElements = sliderTrackEl.querySelectorAll('.single-image-caption-slider-item-container');

            if (initialItemElements.length === 0) {
                sliderTrackEl.innerHTML = ''; 
                actualPagesCount = 0;
                updatePagination(); 
                return; 
            }
            
            const initialItemsHTML = [];
            initialItemElements.forEach(itemEl => {
                initialItemsHTML.push(itemEl.outerHTML);
            });

            sliderTrackEl.innerHTML = ''; 

            const dataForSlider = initialItemsHTML.map(itemHTML => [itemHTML]); 
            actualPagesCount = dataForSlider.length; 
            
            if (actualPagesCount === 0) { 
                 updatePagination();
                 return; 
            }

            const slidesToRender = [
                dataForSlider[actualPagesCount - 1], 
                ...dataForSlider,

            window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); 
            window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); 
            console.log("CareersTopicSlider: Event listeners anexados.");
        }

        function handleResize() {
             const currentIsMobile = isMobileView();
            if (currentIsMobile !== previousIsMobile) {
                console.log("CareersTopicSlider: Mudança de visualização detectada, reconfigurando.");
                setupSlider(); 
            } else {
                if (!sliderTrackEl) return; 
                const pages = sliderTrackEl.querySelectorAll('.careers-topic-slider-page'); 
                const newSliderWidth = getSliderWidth();
                pages.forEach(page => {
                    page.style.width = `${newSliderWidth}px`; 
                });
                goToTrackIndex(currentPageIndex + 1, false); 
                updatePagination(); 
            }
        }

        window.addEventListener('load', setupSlider);
    })();

    <script>
        (function() {
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.career-quote-slide');
                const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.career-pagination-dot');
                let currentSlideIndex = 0;

                if (slides.length === 0 || dots.length === 0 || slides.length !== dots.length) {
                    console.error("Career Quote slider: Number of slides and pagination dots do not match or elements not found.");
                    return;
                }

                function showSlide(index) {
                    if (index < 0 || index >= slides.length) return;

                    slides[currentSlideIndex].classList.remove('career-active-quote');
                    dots[currentSlideIndex].classList.remove('active');

                    slides[index].classList.add('career-active-quote');
                    dots[index].classList.add('active');

                    currentSlideIndex = index;
                }

                dots.forEach(dot => {
                    dot.addEventListener('click', () => {
                        const targetIndex = parseInt(dot.getAttribute('data-slide-target'), 10);
                        showSlide(targetIndex);
                    });
                });

                if (slides.length > 0) {
                    showSlide(0);
                }
            });
        })();
    </script>

            sliderTrackEl = document.getElementById('application-page-slider-1-track');
            paginationActiveBarEl = document.getElementById('application-page-slider-1-pagination-active-bar');
            paginationSegmentsClickable = document.querySelectorAll('.application-page-slider-1-pagination-segment-clickable');

            if (!sliderContentEl || !sliderTrackEl ) {
                console.error("ApplicationPageSlider1: Elementos essenciais do slider não encontrados. Abortando setup.");
                return;
            }
             if (!paginationActiveBarEl) {
                console.warn("ApplicationPageSlider1: Elemento #application-page-slider-1-pagination-active-bar não encontrado.");
            }
            if (paginationSegmentsClickable.length !== 3) { 
                console.warn(`ApplicationPageSlider1: Esperava 3 .application-page-slider-1-pagination-segment-clickable, encontrou ${paginationSegmentsClickable.length}.`);
            }
            
            const initialItemElements = sliderTrackEl.querySelectorAll('.application-page-slider-1-item-container');
            console.log(`ApplicationPageSlider1: Encontrados ${initialItemElements.length} itens no HTML.`);

            if (initialItemElements.length === 0) {
                console.warn("ApplicationPageSlider1: Nenhum item encontrado no HTML do track. O slider ficará vazio.");
                sliderTrackEl.innerHTML = ''; 
                actualPagesCount = 0;
                updatePagination(); 
                return; 
            }
            
            const initialItemsHTML = [];
            initialItemElements.forEach(itemEl => {
                initialItemsHTML.push(itemEl.outerHTML);
            });

            sliderTrackEl.innerHTML = ''; 

            const currentIsMobile = isMobileView();
            let dataForSlider; 
            
            if (currentIsMobile) {
                dataForSlider = initialItemsHTML.map(itemHTML => [itemHTML]); 
                actualPagesCount = dataForSlider.length; 
                console.log(`ApplicationPageSlider1: Visualização Mobile. Páginas: ${actualPagesCount}`);
            } else {
                dataForSlider = [];
                const itemsPerPageDesktop = 4; 
                for (let i = 0; i < initialItemsHTML.length; i += itemsPerPageDesktop) {
                    dataForSlider.push(initialItemsHTML.slice(i, i + itemsPerPageDesktop)); 
                }
                actualPagesCount = dataForSlider.length; 
                console.log(`ApplicationPageSlider1: Visualização Desktop. Páginas: ${actualPagesCount}`);
            }
            
            if (actualPagesCount === 0 && initialItemsHTML.length > 0 ) { 
                 console.warn("ApplicationPageSlider1: actualPagesCount é 0. Verifique a lógica de agrupamento ou o número de itens HTML.");
                 updatePagination();
                 return; 
            } else if (actualPagesCount === 0 && initialItemsHTML.length === 0) {
                 console.log("ApplicationPageSlider1: Nenhum item para processar.");
                 updatePagination();
                 return;
            }

            const slidesToRender = [
                dataForSlider[actualPagesCount - 1], 
                ...dataForSlider,                    
                dataForSlider[0]                     
            ];
            
            const sliderPageWidth = getSliderWidth(); 
            if (sliderPageWidth === 0) {
                console.warn("ApplicationPageSlider1: getSliderWidth() retornou 0.");
            }

            slidesToRender.forEach((pageDataItemsHTML, index) => { 
                if (!pageDataItemsHTML || pageDataItemsHTML.length === 0) { 
                    console.warn(`ApplicationPageSlider1: Tentando renderizar uma página vazia no índice do track ${index}.`);
                    return; 
                }
                const pageElement = document.createElement('div');
                pageElement.className = 'application-page-slider-1-page'; 
                pageElement.style.width = `${sliderPageWidth}px`; 
                pageElement.innerHTML = pageDataItemsHTML.join(''); 
                sliderTrackEl.appendChild(pageElement);
            });
            
            currentPageIndex = 0; 
            currentTrackIndex = 1; 
            goToTrackIndex(currentTrackIndex, false); 
            updatePagination(); 
            previousIsMobile = currentIsMobile; 
            sliderContentEl.classList.add('application-page-slider-1-initialized');
            console.log(`ApplicationPageSlider1: Configuração concluída. Páginas lógicas: ${actualPagesCount}`);
            
            attachEventListeners();
        }
        
        function goToTrackIndex(trackIndex, animate = true) {
            if (!sliderTrackEl) return; 
            sliderTrackEl.style.transition = animate ? 'transform 0.5s ease-in-out' : 'none';
            const targetX = -trackIndex * getSliderWidth();
            sliderTrackEl.style.transform = `translateX(${targetX}px)`;
            currentTrackIndex = trackIndex; 
        }

        function handleInfiniteLoop() {
            let targetRealPageIndex;

            if (currentTrackIndex === 0) { 
                targetRealPageIndex = actualPagesCount - 1;
            } else if (currentTrackIndex === actualPagesCount + 1) { 
                targetRealPageIndex = 0;
            } else { 
                targetRealPageIndex = currentTrackIndex - 1;
            }

            currentPageIndex = targetRealPageIndex; 
            updatePagination(); 

            if (currentTrackIndex === 0) {
                goToTrackIndex(actualPagesCount, false); 
            } else if (currentTrackIndex === actualPagesCount + 1) {
                goToTrackIndex(1, false);
            }
        }
        
        function navigateToPage(pageDataIndex) { 
            if (pageDataIndex < 0 || pageDataIndex >= actualPagesCount) return; 
            if (pageDataIndex === currentPageIndex && !isDragging) return; 
            
            currentTrackIndex = pageDataIndex + 1; 
            goToTrackIndex(currentTrackIndex, true); 
        }

        function updatePagination() {
            if (actualPagesCount === 0 || !paginationActiveBarEl) return; 
            const segmentWidthPercentage = 100 / actualPagesCount; 
            paginationActiveBarEl.style.width = `${segmentWidthPercentage}%`;
            
            const activeBarPositionPercentage = currentPageIndex * 100; 
            
            paginationActiveBarEl.style.transform = `translateX(${activeBarPositionPercentage}%)`;
        }

        function handleDragStart(e) {
            isDragging = true;
            startX = e.pageX || e.touches[0].pageX;
            if (!sliderTrackEl) return; 
            sliderTrackEl.style.transition = 'none'; 
            initialTrackX = -currentTrackIndex * getSliderWidth(); 
            if (sliderContentEl) sliderContentEl.classList.add('application-page-slider-1-dragging'); 
        }

        function handleDragMove(e) {
            if (!isDragging || !sliderTrackEl) return; 
            e.preventDefault(); 
            currentX = e.pageX || e.touches[0].pageX;
            const diffX = currentX - startX;
            sliderTrackEl.style.transform = `translateX(${initialTrackX + diffX}px)`; 
        }

        function handleDragEnd() {
            if (!isDragging) return;
            isDragging = false;
            if (sliderContentEl) sliderContentEl.classList.remove('application-page-slider-1-dragging'); 
            if (!sliderTrackEl) return; 
            sliderTrackEl.style.transition = 'transform 0.5s ease-in-out'; 

            const diffX = currentX - startX;

            if (Math.abs(diffX) > dragThreshold) { 
                if (diffX < 0) { 
                    goToTrackIndex(currentTrackIndex + 1, true);
                } else { 
                    goToTrackIndex(currentTrackIndex - 1, true);
                }
            } else { 
                goToTrackIndex(currentTrackIndex, true);
            }
        }
        
        function attachEventListeners() {
            console.log("ApplicationPageSlider1: Anexando event listeners.");
            if (sliderTrackEl) { 
                sliderTrackEl.addEventListener('transitionend', handleInfiniteLoop);
            } else {
                console.error("ApplicationPageSlider1: Não foi possível anexar 'transitionend'.");
            }

            if (sliderContentEl) { 
                sliderContentEl.addEventListener('mousedown', handleDragStart);
                sliderContentEl.addEventListener('touchstart', handleDragStart, { passive: true });
            } else {
                 console.error("ApplicationPageSlider1: Não foi possível anexar listeners de drag.");
            }
            document.addEventListener('mousemove', handleDragMove);
            document.addEventListener('mouseup', handleDragEnd);
            document.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => { 
                if (isDragging) handleDragEnd();
            });
            document.addEventListener('touchmove', handleDragMove, { passive: false });
            document.addEventListener('touchend', handleDragEnd);

            if (paginationSegmentsClickable && paginationSegmentsClickable.length > 0) {
                paginationSegmentsClickable.forEach(segment => {
                    segment.replaceWith(segment.cloneNode(true)); 
                });
                document.querySelectorAll('.application-page-slider-1-pagination-segment-clickable').forEach(segment => {
                     segment.addEventListener('click', () => {
                        const segmentIndex = parseInt(segment.dataset.pageSegment);
                        let pageIndexToNavigate;

                        if (isMobileView()) { 
                            if (segmentIndex === 0) pageIndexToNavigate = 0; 
                            else if (segmentIndex === 1) pageIndexToNavigate = Math.floor((actualPagesCount -1) / 2); 
                            else pageIndexToNavigate = actualPagesCount - 1; 
                        } else { 
                            if (segmentIndex === 0) pageIndexToNavigate = 0; 
                            else if (segmentIndex === 1) pageIndexToNavigate = Math.max(0, Math.min(actualPagesCount - 1, Math.floor((actualPagesCount -1) / 2) )); // Middle page for desktop
                            else pageIndexToNavigate = actualPagesCount -1; 
                        }
                        navigateToPage(pageIndexToNavigate);
                    });
                });

            } else {
                 console.warn("ApplicationPageSlider1: Nenhum segmento de paginação clicável encontrado.");
            }
            
            window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); 
            window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); 
            console.log("ApplicationPageSlider1: Event listeners anexados.");
        }

        function handleResize() {
             const currentIsMobile = isMobileView();
            if (currentIsMobile !== previousIsMobile) {
                console.log("ApplicationPageSlider1: Mudança de visualização detectada, reconfigurando.");
                setupSlider(); 
            } else {
                if (!sliderTrackEl) return; 
                const pages = sliderTrackEl.querySelectorAll('.application-page-slider-1-page'); 
                const newSliderWidth = getSliderWidth();
                pages.forEach(page => {
                    page.style.width = `${newSliderWidth}px`; 
                });
                goToTrackIndex(currentPageIndex + 1, false); 
                updatePagination(); 
            }
        }

        window.addEventListener('load', setupSlider);
    })(); 
    </script>



    <script>
        const activeClassNameSlider2 = 'blueprint-slider2-slide-active';
        const activeImageClassName = 'blueprint-slider2-slide-gallery-image-active';
        const activeDotClassName = 'blueprint-slider2-slide-active-dot';
        let currentSlideIndexSlider2 = 0;

        function setupImageGallery(slideItemElement) {
            const galleryWrapper = slideItemElement.querySelector('.blueprint-slider2-slide-image-gallery-wrapper');
            const dotsContainer = slideItemElement.querySelector('.blueprint-slider2-slide-image-dots');
            const images = galleryWrapper.querySelectorAll('.blueprint-slider2-slide-content-image');
            
            dotsContainer.innerHTML = ''; // Clear previous dots

            if (images.length <= 1) { // No dots needed for 0 or 1 image
                if (images.length === 1) images[0].classList.add(activeImageClassName);
                return;
            }

            images.forEach((img, index) => {
                img.classList.remove(activeImageClassName); // Reset all images
                if (index === 0) {
                    img.classList.add(activeImageClassName); // Activate first image
                }

                const dot = document.createElement('span');
                dot.classList.add('blueprint-slider2-slide-image-dot');
                dot.dataset.imageIndex = index;
                if (index === 0) {
                    dot.classList.add(activeDotClassName);
                }
                dot.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    setActiveImage(galleryWrapper, dotsContainer, index);
                });
                dotsContainer.appendChild(dot);
            });
        }

        function setActiveImage(galleryWrapper, dotsContainer, imageIndex) {
            const images = galleryWrapper.querySelectorAll('.blueprint-slider2-slide-content-image');
            const dots = dotsContainer.querySelectorAll('.blueprint-slider2-slide-image-dot');

            images.forEach((img, idx) => {
                img.classList.toggle(activeImageClassName, idx === imageIndex);
            });
            dots.forEach((dot, idx) => {
                dot.classList.toggle(activeDotClassName, idx === imageIndex);
            });
        }

        function renderSlideSlider2(index, allSlideItems, paginationContainerEl) {
            allSlideItems.forEach(item => {
                item.classList.remove(activeClassNameSlider2);
            });

            const targetSlideElement = allSlideItems[index];

            if (targetSlideElement) {
                targetSlideElement.classList.add(activeClassNameSlider2);
                setupImageGallery(targetSlideElement);
            }
            updateActivePillSlider2(index, paginationContainerEl);
        }
        
        function createPaginationSlider2(paginationContainerEl, allSlideItems) {
            let maxWidth = 0;
            const tempPills = []; 

            allSlideItems.forEach((slideItem, index) => {
                const pillText = slideItem.dataset.pillText || `Slide ${index + 1}`;
                const pill = document.createElement('div');
                pill.classList.add('blueprint-slider2-slide-pill');
                pill.dataset.index = index; 
                
                const pillTextSpan = document.createElement('span');
                pillTextSpan.textContent = pillText;
                pill.appendChild(pillTextSpan);
                
                paginationContainerEl.appendChild(pill); 
                if (pill.offsetWidth > maxWidth) {
                    maxWidth = pill.offsetWidth;
                }
                tempPills.push(pill); 

                pill.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    if (currentSlideIndexSlider2 !== index) { 
                        currentSlideIndexSlider2 = index;
                        renderSlideSlider2(currentSlideIndexSlider2, allSlideItems, paginationContainerEl);
                    }
                });
            });

            tempPills.forEach(pill => {
                pill.style.minWidth = `${maxWidth}px`;
            });
        }

        function updateActivePillSlider2(activeIndex, paginationContainerEl) {
            const pills = paginationContainerEl.querySelectorAll('.blueprint-slider2-slide-pill');
            pills.forEach((pill, index) => {
                pill.classList.toggle(activeClassNameSlider2, index === activeIndex);
            });
        }

        function initSlider2() {
            const paginationContainerEl = document.getElementById('blueprintSlider2PaginationContainer');
            const allSlidesWrapperEl = document.getElementById('blueprintSlider2AllSlidesWrapper');

            if (!paginationContainerEl || !allSlidesWrapperEl) {
                console.warn('Blueprint Slider 2: Essential container elements not found. Slider not initialized.');
                return;
            }
            
            const allSlideItems = allSlidesWrapperEl.querySelectorAll('.blueprint-slider2-slide-item');

            if (!allSlideItems.length) {
                 console.warn('Blueprint Slider 2: No slide items found. Slider not initialized.');
                return;
            }

            createPaginationSlider2(paginationContainerEl, allSlideItems);
            renderSlideSlider2(currentSlideIndexSlider2, allSlideItems, paginationContainerEl); 
        }

        if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initSlider2);
        } else {
            initSlider2();
        }
    </script>

<script>
    // A propriedade "mainTitle" foi removida pois não é mais utilizada.
    const slidesData = [
        { id: 'omega', pillText: 'Omega' },
        { id: 'source', pillText: 'Switch' },
        { id: 'detector', pillText: 'Edge Coupler' },
        { id: 'switch', pillText: 'Detector' },
        { id: 'interferometer', pillText: 'Interferometer' },
        { id: 'edge-coupler', pillText: 'Source' }
    ];

    const activeClassName = 'blueprint-slider1-slide-active';
    let currentSlideIndex = 0;

    // A função foi simplificada para não receber mais o 'mainTitleEl'.
    function renderSlide(index, allSlideItems, paginationContainerEl) {
        const slideData = slidesData[index];

        // O bloco de código que animava e mudava o texto do título foi removido.

        allSlideItems.forEach(item => {
            item.classList.remove(activeClassName);
        });

        const targetSlideId = 'blueprint-slider1-slide-' + slideData.id;
        const newActiveSlide = document.getElementById(targetSlideId);

        if (newActiveSlide) {
            newActiveSlide.classList.add(activeClassName);
        }
        updateActivePill(index, paginationContainerEl);
    }

    // A função foi simplificada para não receber mais o 'mainTitleEl'.
    function createPagination(paginationContainerEl, allSlideItems) {
        slidesData.forEach((slide, index) => {
            const pill = document.createElement('div');
            pill.classList.add('blueprint-slider1-slide-pill');
            pill.dataset.index = index; 
            
            const pillTextSpan = document.createElement('span');
            pillTextSpan.textContent = slide.pillText;
            pill.appendChild(pillTextSpan);

            pill.addEventListener('click', () => {
                if (currentSlideIndex !== index) { 
                    currentSlideIndex = index;
                    // A chamada para renderSlide foi atualizada.
                    renderSlide(currentSlideIndex, allSlideItems, paginationContainerEl);
                }
            });
            paginationContainerEl.appendChild(pill);
        });
    }

    function updateActivePill(activeIndex, paginationContainerEl) {
        const pills = paginationContainerEl.querySelectorAll('.blueprint-slider1-slide-pill');
        pills.forEach((pill, index) => {
            if (index === activeIndex) {
                pill.classList.add(activeClassName);
            } else {
                pill.classList.remove(activeClassName);
            }
        });
    }

    function initSlider() {
        // Removida a busca pelo 'mainTitleEl'.
        const paginationContainerEl = document.getElementById('blueprintSlider1PaginationContainer');
        const allSlidesWrapperEl = document.getElementById('blueprintSlider1AllSlidesWrapper');

        // A verificação do 'mainTitleEl' foi removida da condição.
        if (!paginationContainerEl || !allSlidesWrapperEl || !allSlidesWrapperEl.children.length) {
            console.warn('Blueprint Slider 1: Essential elements not found. Slider not initialized.');
            return;
        }
        
        const allSlideItems = allSlidesWrapperEl.querySelectorAll('.blueprint-slider1-slide-item');

        if (!allSlideItems.length) {
             console.warn('Blueprint Slider 1: No slide items found. Slider not initialized.');
             return;
        }

        // As chamadas de função foram atualizadas.
        createPagination(paginationContainerEl, allSlideItems);
        renderSlide(currentSlideIndex, allSlideItems, paginationContainerEl); 
    }

    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initSlider);
    } else {
        initSlider();
    }
</script>

            console.log(`AboutPageSlider2: Configuração do slider concluída. Páginas lógicas: ${actualPagesCount}, Track Index inicial: ${currentTrackIndex}`);
            
            attachEventListeners();
        }
        
        function goToTrackIndex(trackIndex, animate = true) {
            if (!sliderTrackEl) return; 
            sliderTrackEl.style.transition = animate ? 'transform 0.5s ease-in-out' : 'none';
            const targetX = -trackIndex * getSliderWidth();
            sliderTrackEl.style.transform = `translateX(${targetX}px)`;
            currentTrackIndex = trackIndex; 
        }

        function handleInfiniteLoop() {
            let targetRealPageIndex;

            if (currentTrackIndex === 0) { 
                targetRealPageIndex = actualPagesCount - 1;
            } else if (currentTrackIndex === actualPagesCount + 1) { 
                targetRealPageIndex = 0;
            } else { 
                targetRealPageIndex = currentTrackIndex - 1;
            }

            currentPageIndex = targetRealPageIndex; 
            updatePagination(); 

            if (currentTrackIndex === 0) {
                goToTrackIndex(actualPagesCount, false); 
            } else if (currentTrackIndex === actualPagesCount + 1) {
                goToTrackIndex(1, false);
            }
        }
        
        function navigateToPage(pageDataIndex) { 
            if (pageDataIndex < 0 || pageDataIndex >= actualPagesCount) return; 
            if (pageDataIndex === currentPageIndex && !isDragging) return; 
            
            currentTrackIndex = pageDataIndex + 1; 
            goToTrackIndex(currentTrackIndex, true); 
        }

        function updatePagination() {
            if (actualPagesCount === 0 || !paginationActiveBarEl) return; 
            const segmentWidthPercentage = 100 / actualPagesCount; 
            paginationActiveBarEl.style.width = `${segmentWidthPercentage}%`;
            
            const activeBarPositionPercentage = currentPageIndex * 100; 
            
            paginationActiveBarEl.style.transform = `translateX(${activeBarPositionPercentage}%)`;
        }

        function handleDragStart(e) {
            isDragging = true;
            startX = e.pageX || e.touches[0].pageX;
            if (!sliderTrackEl) return; 
            sliderTrackEl.style.transition = 'none'; 
            initialTrackX = -currentTrackIndex * getSliderWidth(); 
            if (sliderContentEl) sliderContentEl.classList.add('about-page-slider-2-dragging'); 
        }

        function handleDragMove(e) {
            if (!isDragging || !sliderTrackEl) return; 
            e.preventDefault(); 
            currentX = e.pageX || e.touches[0].pageX;
            const diffX = currentX - startX;
            sliderTrackEl.style.transform = `translateX(${initialTrackX + diffX}px)`; 
        }

        function handleDragEnd() {
            if (!isDragging) return;
            isDragging = false;
            if (sliderContentEl) sliderContentEl.classList.remove('about-page-slider-2-dragging'); 
            if (!sliderTrackEl) return; 
            sliderTrackEl.style.transition = 'transform 0.5s ease-in-out'; 

            const diffX = currentX - startX;

            if (Math.abs(diffX) > dragThreshold) { 
                if (diffX < 0) { 
                    goToTrackIndex(currentTrackIndex + 1, true);
                } else { 
                    goToTrackIndex(currentTrackIndex - 1, true);
                }
            } else { 
                goToTrackIndex(currentTrackIndex, true);
            }
        }
        
        function attachEventListeners() {
            console.log("AboutPageSlider2: Anexando event listeners.");
            if (sliderTrackEl) { 
                sliderTrackEl.addEventListener('transitionend', handleInfiniteLoop);
            } else {
                console.error("AboutPageSlider2: Não foi possível anexar 'transitionend': sliderTrackEl não encontrado.");
            }

            if (sliderContentEl) { 
                sliderContentEl.addEventListener('mousedown', handleDragStart);
                sliderContentEl.addEventListener('touchstart', handleDragStart, { passive: true });
            } else {
                 console.error("AboutPageSlider2: Não foi possível anexar listeners de drag: sliderContentEl não encontrado.");
            }
            document.addEventListener('mousemove', handleDragMove);
            document.addEventListener('mouseup', handleDragEnd);
            document.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => { 
                if (isDragging) handleDragEnd();
            });
            document.addEventListener('touchmove', handleDragMove, { passive: false });
            document.addEventListener('touchend', handleDragEnd);

            if (paginationSegmentsClickable && paginationSegmentsClickable.length > 0) {
                paginationSegmentsClickable.forEach(segment => {
                    segment.addEventListener('click', () => {
                        const segmentIndex = parseInt(segment.dataset.pageSegment);
                        let pageIndexToNavigate;

                        if (isMobileView()) { // Mobile: 16 items, 16 pages
                            if (segmentIndex === 0) pageIndexToNavigate = 0; // First item
                            else if (segmentIndex === 1) pageIndexToNavigate = Math.floor((actualPagesCount -1) / 2); // Middle item (e.g. page 7 for 16 pages)
                            else pageIndexToNavigate = actualPagesCount - 1; // Last item
                        } else { // Desktop: 4 items per page, 4 pages
                            if (segmentIndex === 0) pageIndexToNavigate = 0; // Page 1
                            else if (segmentIndex === 1) pageIndexToNavigate = 1; // Page 2 (can adjust if needed for 4 pages)
                            else pageIndexToNavigate = actualPagesCount -1; // Page 4 (last page)
                        }
                        navigateToPage(pageIndexToNavigate);
                    });
                });
            } else {
                 console.warn("AboutPageSlider2: Nenhum .about-page-slider-2-pagination-segment-clickable encontrado.");
            }
            
            window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
                const currentIsMobile = isMobileView();
                if (currentIsMobile !== previousIsMobile) {
                    console.log("AboutPageSlider2: Mudança de visualização detectada (mobile/desktop), reconfigurando o slider.");
                    setupSlider(); 
                } else {
                    if (!sliderTrackEl) return; 
                    const pages = sliderTrackEl.querySelectorAll('.about-page-slider-2-page'); 
                    const newSliderWidth = getSliderWidth();
                    pages.forEach(page => {
                        page.style.width = `${newSliderWidth}px`; 
                    });
                    goToTrackIndex(currentPageIndex + 1, false); 
                    updatePagination(); 
                }
            });
            console.log("AboutPageSlider2: Event listeners anexados.");
        }
        window.addEventListener('load', setupSlider);
    })(); 
    </script>

<script>
        // IIFE to encapsulate
        (function() {
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.quote-slide');
                const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.pagination-dot');
                let currentSlideIndex = 0;

                if (slides.length === 0 || dots.length === 0 || slides.length !== dots.length) {
                    console.error("Quote slider: Number of slides and pagination dots do not match or elements not found.");
                    return;
                }

                function showSlide(index) {
                    if (index < 0 || index >= slides.length) return;

                    slides[currentSlideIndex].classList.remove('active-quote');
                    dots[currentSlideIndex].classList.remove('active');

                    slides[index].classList.add('active-quote');
                    dots[index].classList.add('active');

                    currentSlideIndex = index;
                }

                dots.forEach(dot => {
                    dot.addEventListener('click', () => {
                        const targetIndex = parseInt(dot.getAttribute('data-slide-target'), 10);
                        showSlide(targetIndex);
                    });
                });

                showSlide(0);

            });
        })();
    </script>

<script>
        // IIFE para encapsular
        (function() {
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                const listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.expandable-list .list-item');
                const imageDisplay = document.getElementById('image-display');
                let activeItem = null;

                if (listItems.length === 0 || !imageDisplay) {
                    console.error("Elementos da lista ou display de imagem não encontrados.");
                    return;
                }

                // Função para calcular e definir a posição/altura do indicador
                function positionIndicator(item) {
                    const indicator = item.querySelector('.item-indicator');
                    const contentWrapper = item.querySelector('.item-content-wrapper');
                    const header = item.querySelector('.item-header');
                    const description = item.querySelector('.item-description');

                    if (!indicator || !contentWrapper || !header || !description) return;

                    // Posição do topo do header RELATIVA AO list-item
                    const headerTopRelativeToListItem = contentWrapper.offsetTop + header.offsetTop;

                    // Calcula a altura do conteúdo visível
                    let contentHeight = header.offsetHeight;
                    if (item.classList.contains('active')) {
                        const descMarginTop = parseFloat(window.getComputedStyle(description).marginTop) || 0;
                        // Usa scrollHeight para altura real da descrição
                        contentHeight += descMarginTop + description.scrollHeight;
                    } else {
                         // Se inativo, a altura deve ser zero para o cálculo do indicador
                         contentHeight = 0; // Garante que indicador inativo tenha altura 0 no cálculo
                    }

                    // Aplica os estilos ao indicador
                    requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                        indicator.style.top = `${headerTopRelativeToListItem}px`;
                        // Define altura zero se não estiver ativo, caso contrário usa a calculada
                        indicator.style.height = item.classList.contains('active') ? `${Math.max(0, contentHeight)}px` : '0px';
                    });
                }

                // Função para trocar imagem com fade
                function changeImageWithFade(imageUrl) {
                     if (!imageDisplay) return;
                     imageDisplay.style.setProperty('--bg-image-before', `url('${imageUrl}')`);
                     imageDisplay.classList.add('fade-in');
                     setTimeout(() => {
                         imageDisplay.style.backgroundImage = `url('${imageUrl}')`;
                         imageDisplay.classList.remove('fade-in');
                         imageDisplay.style.removeProperty('--bg-image-before');
                     }, 800);
                 }
                 imageDisplay.style.setProperty('--bg-image-before', 'none');


                function setActiveItem(clickedItem) {
                    if (clickedItem === activeItem) return;

                    // Desativa o item anterior
                    if (activeItem) {
                        const oldDesc = activeItem.querySelector('.item-description');
                        activeItem.classList.remove('active'); // Remove classe do LI
                        if (oldDesc) {
                            oldDesc.style.maxHeight = '0px';
                            oldDesc.style.marginTop = '0px';
                        }
                         // Reseta explicitamente a altura do indicador antigo
                         const oldIndicator = activeItem.querySelector('.item-indicator');
                         if (oldIndicator) oldIndicator.style.height = '0px';
                    }

                    // Ativa o novo item
                    const newDesc = clickedItem.querySelector('.item-description');
                    clickedItem.classList.add('active'); // Adiciona classe ao LI
                    if (newDesc) {
                        newDesc.style.marginTop = '0.5rem';
                        // Define max-height para animar abertura
                         requestAnimationFrame(() => { // Garante cálculo após DOM update
                             newDesc.style.maxHeight = newDesc.scrollHeight + "px";
                             // Posiciona o indicador APÓS definir maxHeight
                             positionIndicator(clickedItem); // Chama para definir altura e top
                         });
                    } else {
                        // Se não houver descrição, posiciona baseado só no header
                        positionIndicator(clickedItem);
                    }

                    activeItem = clickedItem; // Atualiza referência

                    // Atualiza imagem
                    const imageSrc = clickedItem.getAttribute('data-image');
                    if (imageSrc) {
                        changeImageWithFade(imageSrc);
                    }
                }

                // Adiciona listeners de clique
                listItems.forEach(item => {
                    item.addEventListener('click', () => { // Listener no LI
                        setActiveItem(item);
                    });

                    // Listener para ajustar indicador após transição da descrição
                    const description = item.querySelector('.item-description');
                     if (description) {
                         description.addEventListener('transitionend', (event) => {
                             if (event.propertyName === 'max-height' && item.classList.contains('active')) {
                                 // Recalcula altura/posição do indicador após animação
                                 positionIndicator(item);
                             }
                         });
                     }
                });

                // Ativa o primeiro item inicialmente
                if (listItems.length > 0) {
                    const firstItem = listItems[0];
                    const initialImageSrc = firstItem.getAttribute('data-image');

                    if (initialImageSrc && imageDisplay) {
                        imageDisplay.style.backgroundImage = `url('${initialImageSrc}')`;
                    }
                    // Usa a função setActiveItem para inicializar corretamente
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        setActiveItem(firstItem);
                    }, 50);
                }

                 // Reposiciona indicador no resize
                 window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
                     if (activeItem) {
                         setTimeout(() => positionIndicator(activeItem), 100);
                     }
                 });

            });
        })();
    </script>


<script>
// IIFE para encapsular
(function() {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.slide');
        const paginationItems = document.querySelectorAll('.pagination-item');
        const paginationBarContainer = document.querySelector('.pagination-bar-container');

        let paginationIndicator = document.querySelector('.pagination-indicator');
        if (!paginationIndicator && paginationBarContainer) {
            console.log("Slider principal: Criando o elemento '.pagination-indicator' dinamicamente.");
            paginationIndicator = document.createElement('div');
            paginationIndicator.classList.add('pagination-indicator');
            paginationBarContainer.appendChild(paginationIndicator);
        }

        if (slides.length === 0 || paginationItems.length === 0 || slides.length !== paginationItems.length) {
            console.error("Slider principal: Número de slides e itens de paginação não correspondem ou elementos não encontrados. Verifique as classes '.slide' e '.pagination-item'.");
            return;
        }
        if (!paginationIndicator && paginationBarContainer) { // Verificação ajustada: só erro se o container existe mas o indicador não pôde ser criado/achado
            console.error("Slider principal: Elemento '.pagination-indicator' não pôde ser encontrado ou criado.");
            // Não retorna aqui, pois o indicador pode ser opcional para a funcionalidade básica se o CSS o esconder
        }
        if (!paginationBarContainer) {
            console.error("Slider principal: Elemento '.pagination-bar-container' não encontrado. O indicador não pode ser posicionado e o scrollIntoView não funcionará como esperado.");
            // Considerar retornar se paginationBarContainer é essencial para outras funcionalidades além do indicador
        }

        // Função para atualizar o slide ativo, item de paginação ativo e indicador
        // Adicionamos o parâmetro 'isInitialLoad' com valor padrão 'false'
        function goToSlide(index, isInitialLoad = false) {
            if (index < 0 || index >= slides.length) {
                console.error("Índice do slide fora dos limites:", index);
                return;
            }

            const currentActiveSlide = document.querySelector('.slide.active-slide');
            const currentActivePaginationItem = document.querySelector('.pagination-item.active-pagination-item');
            if (currentActiveSlide) {
                currentActiveSlide.classList.remove('active-slide');
            }
            if (currentActivePaginationItem) {
                currentActivePaginationItem.classList.remove('active-pagination-item');
            }

            slides[index].classList.add('active-slide');
            paginationItems[index].classList.add('active-pagination-item');

            if (paginationIndicator && paginationBarContainer) {
                const targetPaginationItem = paginationItems[index];
                const containerRect = paginationBarContainer.getBoundingClientRect();
                const itemRect = targetPaginationItem.getBoundingClientRect();
                const scrollOffset = paginationBarContainer.scrollLeft;

                requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                    const indicatorLeft = itemRect.left - containerRect.left + scrollOffset;
                    const indicatorWidth = targetPaginationItem.offsetWidth;
                    if (document.body.contains(paginationIndicator)) {
                        paginationIndicator.style.left = `${indicatorLeft}px`;
                        paginationIndicator.style.width = `${indicatorWidth}px`;
                    }
                });

                // MODIFICAÇÃO AQUI:
                // Só executa scrollIntoView se NÃO for a carga inicial
                if (!isInitialLoad) {
                    targetPaginationItem.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', inline: 'center', block: 'nearest' });
                }
            }
        }

        paginationItems.forEach(item => {
            item.addEventListener('mouseover', () => {
                const slideIndex = parseInt(item.getAttribute('data-slide-index'), 10);
                if (!isNaN(slideIndex)) {
                    goToSlide(slideIndex); // Chamada normal, isInitialLoad será false por padrão
                } else {
                    console.error("Atributo 'data-slide-index' não encontrado ou inválido no item:", item);
                }
            });

            item.addEventListener('click', () => {
                const slideIndex = parseInt(item.getAttribute('data-slide-index'), 10);
                if (!isNaN(slideIndex)) {
                    goToSlide(slideIndex); // Chamada normal, isInitialLoad será false por padrão
                } else {
                    console.error("Atributo 'data-slide-index' não encontrado ou inválido no item:", item);
                }
            });
        });

        setTimeout(() => {
            // MODIFICAÇÃO AQUI: Passamos 'true' para isInitialLoad
            goToSlide(0, true);
        }, 100);


        let resizeTimeout;
        window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
            clearTimeout(resizeTimeout);
            resizeTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
                const currentActiveIndex = Array.from(paginationItems).findIndex(item => item.classList.contains('active-pagination-item'));
                if (currentActiveIndex !== -1 && paginationIndicator && paginationBarContainer) {
                    const targetPaginationItem = paginationItems[currentActiveIndex];
                    const containerRect = paginationBarContainer.getBoundingClientRect();
                    const itemRect = targetPaginationItem.getBoundingClientRect();
                    const scrollOffset = paginationBarContainer.scrollLeft;
                    requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                        if (document.body.contains(paginationIndicator)) {
                            const indicatorLeft = itemRect.left - containerRect.left + scrollOffset;
                            const indicatorWidth = targetPaginationItem.offsetWidth;
                            paginationIndicator.style.left = `${indicatorLeft}px`;
                            paginationIndicator.style.width = `${indicatorWidth}px`;
                        }
                    });
                }
            }, 250);
        });

        if (paginationIndicator && paginationBarContainer) {
            let scrollTimeout;
            paginationBarContainer.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
                clearTimeout(scrollTimeout);
                scrollTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
                    const currentActiveIndex = Array.from(paginationItems).findIndex(item => item.classList.contains('active-pagination-item'));
                    if (currentActiveIndex !== -1) {
                        const targetPaginationItem = paginationItems[currentActiveIndex];
                        const containerRect = paginationBarContainer.getBoundingClientRect();
                        const itemRect = targetPaginationItem.getBoundingClientRect();
                        const scrollOffset = paginationBarContainer.scrollLeft;
                        requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                            if (document.body.contains(paginationIndicator)) {
                                const indicatorLeft = itemRect.left - containerRect.left + scrollOffset;
                                paginationIndicator.style.left = `${indicatorLeft}px`;
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }, 150);
            }, { passive: true });
        }
    });
})();
</script>


<script>
  // IIFE para encapsular o código e evitar conflitos globais
  (function() {
    // Espera o HTML carregar
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
      const divider = document.getElementById('scroll-divider');

      // Verifica se o elemento divisor existe
      if (!divider) {
        console.error("Elemento divisor (#scroll-divider) não encontrado. Verifique o ID no HTML.");
        return; // Interrompe se não encontrar
      }

      let startTime = null; // Para rastrear o tempo da animação
      const animationDuration = 3000; // Duração de um ciclo COMPLETO (ida e volta) em ms (ex: 3 segundos)
      const mainColor = '#7735fc';      // Cor principal/escura
      const highlightColor = '#ba97fc'; // Cor clara que vai se mover
      // *** AUMENTADO O TAMANHO DA FAIXA ***
      const bandWidthPercent = 90;      // Largura da faixa clara em porcentagem (ex: 70% - bem maior)

      // Função que será chamada repetidamente para animar
      const animateDivider = (timestamp) => {
        // Garante que o divisor ainda existe no DOM
        if (!document.body.contains(divider)) {
            console.log("Elemento divisor removido do DOM, parando a animação.");
            return;
        }

        if (!startTime) {
          startTime = timestamp; // Define o tempo inicial na primeira execução
        }

        const elapsedTime = timestamp - startTime;
        // Calcula o progresso dentro de um ciclo (0 a 1)
        const progressRaw = (elapsedTime % animationDuration) / animationDuration;

        // --- Lógica de Animação Modificada (Ping-Pong) ---

        // Usa cosseno para criar um movimento suave de ida e volta (0 -> 1 -> 0)
        // Math.cos(progressRaw * Math.PI * 2) vai de 1 a -1 e volta a 1.
        // (1 - cos) / 2 mapeia isso para o intervalo 0 a 1 e volta a 0.
        const angle = progressRaw * Math.PI * 2; // Ângulo para um ciclo completo (0 a 2*PI)
        const pingPongProgress = (1 - Math.cos(angle)) / 2; // Valor oscilante entre 0 e 1

        // Calcula a posição central da faixa clara (0% a 100%) com base no progresso oscilante
        const centerPercent = pingPongProgress * 100;

        // Calcula as posições de início e fim da transição para a cor clara
        // Garante que as posições fiquem dentro de 0 e 100
        const startHighlight = Math.max(0, centerPercent - bandWidthPercent / 2);
        const endHighlight = Math.min(100, centerPercent + bandWidthPercent / 2);

        // Define o gradiente para ir de cima para baixo ('to bottom')
        divider.style.background = `linear-gradient(to bottom,
          ${mainColor} 0%,
          ${mainColor} ${startHighlight}%,
          ${highlightColor} ${centerPercent}%,
          ${mainColor} ${endHighlight}%,
          ${mainColor} 100%
        )`;
        // --- Fim da Lógica Modificada ---

        // Solicita o próximo quadro da animação, criando o loop
        requestAnimationFrame(animateDivider);
      };

      // Inicia o loop da animação
      requestAnimationFrame(animateDivider);

    });
  })(); // Executa a IIFE
</script>



<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Seleciona o botão de fechar
    const closeButton = document.getElementById('close-business-bar');
    // Seleciona o wrapper da barra de negócios
    const businessBarWrapper = document.getElementById('business-bar-wrapper');
    // Seleciona o corpo do documento
    const bodyElement = document.body;

    // Verifica se ambos os elementos existem para evitar erros
    if (closeButton && businessBarWrapper && bodyElement) {
        closeButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
            // Adiciona a classe 'hidden' ao wrapper da barra para escondê-la
            businessBarWrapper.classList.add('hidden');
            
            // Adiciona a classe 'business-bar-hidden' ao body para ajustar o header
            bodyElement.classList.add('business-bar-hidden');
            
            // Opcional: Log para confirmar que o evento ocorreu (bom para debug)
            // console.log('Business bar fechada!');
        });
    } else {
        if (!closeButton) {
            console.error('Botão #close-business-bar não encontrado.');
        }
        if (!businessBarWrapper) {
            console.error('Elemento #business-bar-wrapper não encontrado.');
        }
    }
});
</script>

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Dynamic Category Filter with Selection</title>
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* Styles are now scoped to #dynamic-category-filter-app */
        body {
            margin: 0;
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app {
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            font-weight: 300; /* Inter Light */
            color: #000000 !important; /* Default text color for the app set to black */
            background-color: #ffffff !important; 
        }

        .pills-section-wrapper {
            background-color: #000000;
            padding-top: 16px;
			padding-bottom: 110px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app #category-filter-pills-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 8px;
            max-width: 1440px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 16px !important;
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .category-pill {
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            padding: 10px 30px;
            border-radius: 9999px;
            border: 1px solid #ffffff;
            font-size: 16px !important;
            font-weight: 300 !important;
            background-color: #000000;
            color: #ffffff; 
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in-out, border-color 0.2s ease-in-out;
            outline: none;
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .category-pill:hover,
        #dynamic-category-filter-app .category-pill.active-pill:hover {
            background-color: #7e58f5;
            border-color: #7e58f5;
            color: #ffffff;
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .category-pill:focus {
            box-shadow: none;
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .category-pill.active-pill {
            background-color: #2b1e55;
            color: #ffffff;
            border-color: #7e58f5;
        }
        
        .main-content-wrapper {
            max-width: 1440px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 16px;
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .featured-news-title-wrapper {
            padding: 0 !important;
            margin-top: 40px;
            margin-bottom: 0;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap; /* Allow wrapping on small screens */
            gap: 20px;
        }
        
        #dynamic-category-filter-app .featured-news-title {
            font-size: 56px !important;
            font-weight: 300 !important;
            color: #000000 !important;
            line-height: 1.1;
            margin: 0;
			padding-top: 30px;
            flex-shrink: 0; /* Prevent title from shrinking */
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .secondary-filters-container {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 24px; /* Increased gap */
            flex-wrap: wrap; /* Allow filters to wrap */
            margin-left: auto; /* Aligns this container to the right */
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .filter-control {
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 6px;
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .filter-control select {
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif !important;
            font-size: 18px !important;
            font-weight: 300 !important; /* Inter Light */
            border: none;
            background-color: transparent;
            padding-right: 20px; /* Space for dropdown arrow */
            -webkit-appearance: none;
            -moz-appearance: none;
            appearance: none;
            cursor: pointer;
            background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='1' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'%3e%3cpolyline points='6 9 12 15 18 9'%3e%3c/polyline%3e%3c/svg%3e");
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-position: right 0 center;
            background-size: 1.2em;
            color: #000000;
        }
        
        #dynamic-category-filter-app .search-filter-wrapper .search-label {
            font-size: 18px !important;
            font-weight: 300 !important;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 6px;
        }
        #dynamic-category-filter-app .search-filter-wrapper .search-icon {
            stroke: black;
            stroke-width: 1;
            width: 1.1em;
            height: 1.1em;
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .search-filter-wrapper #search-input {
            display: none;
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif !important;
            font-size: 18px !important;
            font-weight: 300 !important;
            border: none;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #c3c3c3;
            background: transparent;
            padding-left: 28px; /* Space for the icon inside the input area */
            width: 150px; 
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .search-filter-wrapper.active .search-label {
            display: none;
        }
        #dynamic-category-filter-app .search-filter-wrapper.active #search-input {
            display: block;
        }
        #dynamic-category-filter-app .search-filter-wrapper .search-icon-input {
            display: none;

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .search-filter-wrapper.active .search-icon-input {
            display: block;
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;

            transform: translateY(-50%);
            width: 1.1em; /* Explicitly set size */
            height: 1.1em; /* Explicitly set size */
        }

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .filter-control select:focus,
        #dynamic-category-filter-app .filter-control input:focus {

        /* Default Item Style */
        #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: row; 
            gap: 40px; 
            padding-left: 0px !important;

        #featured-item-wrapper {

        }

        .divider-container {

        .section-divider {

        #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item-text-column {

        #clear-filters-btn {

            transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in-out, color 0.2s ease-in-out, border-color 0.2s ease-in-out;

        #see-more-btn .arrow svg {

        /* Responsive Adjustments for Mobile */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {

            #dynamic-category-filter-app #category-filter-pills-container {
                padding: 16px 30px !important; 
                flex-wrap: nowrap;
                overflow-x: auto;
                -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
                justify-content: flex-start;
                -ms-overflow-style: none;  /* IE and Edge */
                scrollbar-width: none;  /* Firefox */
            }

            #dynamic-category-filter-app #category-filter-pills-container::-webkit-scrollbar {
                display: none; /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
            }

            #dynamic-category-filter-app .category-pill {
                flex-shrink: 0; /* Prevent pills from shrinking */
            }

            #dynamic-category-filter-app .featured-news-title-wrapper {

                align-items: flex-start;
                margin-top: 50px !important;
            }
             #dynamic-category-filter-app .featured-news-title {

            }

            }

            }

            #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item,
            #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item.featured-item {
                flex-direction: column !important; 
                gap: 20px !important; 
                padding-right: 0px !important;

                margin-bottom: 0px !important;
                padding-bottom: 0px !important; 
            }
            
            #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item-image-column,
            #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item.featured-item .summary-item-image-column {
                width: 100% !important; 
                order: -1; 
                margin-bottom: 15px; 
            }
            #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item-text-column,
            #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item.featured-item .summary-item-text-column {

            }

            #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item .item-image-container,
            #dynamic-category-filter-app .featured-item .item-image-container {

            #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item h3.item-title {

            #dynamic-category-filter-app .summary-item h3.item-title,
            #dynamic-category-filter-app .featured-item h3.item-title {

         @media (max-width: 480px) {

            }
