    </style>
</head>
<body> 
    <div id="dynamic-category-filter-app">
        <div class="pills-section-wrapper">
            <div id="category-filter-pills-container"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="main-content-wrapper">
            <div id="featured-item-wrapper"></div>
            
            <div class="divider-container" style="display: none;">
                <hr class="section-divider">
            </div>

            <div class="featured-news-title-wrapper" id="latest-posts-header">
                <h2 class="featured-news-title">Latest posts</h2>
                <div class="secondary-filters-container">
                    <div class="filter-control">
                        <select id="year-filter">
                            <option value="all">Year</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <div class="filter-control">
                        <select id="sort-filter">
                            <option value="newest">Sort</option>
                            <option value="a-z">A-Z</option>
                            <option value="z-a">Z-A</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <div class="filter-control search-filter-wrapper">
                        <span class="search-label">
                            <span>Search</span>
                            <svg class="search-icon" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M21 21l-6-6m2-5a7 7 0 11-14 0 7 7 0 0114 0z"></path></svg>
                        </span>
                        <svg class="search-icon-input" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M21 21l-6-6m2-5a7 7 0 11-14 0 7 7 0 0114 0z"></path></svg>
                        <input type="text" id="search-input" placeholder="Search...">
                    </div>
                    <div class="filter-control" id="clear-filters-container" style="display: none;">
                        <button id="clear-filters-btn">Clear filters</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div id="latest-items-wrapper">
                <p class="message-area loading-message">Loading articles...</p>
            </div>
            <div id="see-more-container" style="text-align: center; padding: 40px 0;"></div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async function () {
            // Configuration: Squarespace collection URL
            const squarespaceCollectionUrl = '/news-import?format=json-pretty'; 
            // Configuration: Categories to display as pills. Order here defines pill order.
            const visibleCategories = ['Company', 'Research', 'Australia', 'Chicago', 'Blog']; 
            // Configuration: Define featured article by its full URL
            const featuredPublicationUrl = '/news-import/psiquantum-and-lockheed-martin-form-strategic-collaboration-to-accelerate-quantum-computing-for-aerospace-and-defense';

            const appContainer = document.getElementById('dynamic-category-filter-app');
            const pillsContainer = appContainer.querySelector('#category-filter-pills-container');
            const featuredItemWrapper = document.getElementById('featured-item-wrapper');
            const dividerContainer = document.querySelector('.divider-container');
            const latestItemsWrapper = document.getElementById('latest-items-wrapper');
            const latestPostsHeader = document.getElementById('latest-posts-header');
            const seeMoreContainer = document.getElementById('see-more-container');
            
            const yearFilter = document.getElementById('year-filter');
            const sortFilter = document.getElementById('sort-filter');
            const searchInput = document.getElementById('search-input');
            const searchWrapper = appContainer.querySelector('.search-filter-wrapper');
            const searchLabel = searchWrapper.querySelector('.search-label');
            const clearFiltersBtn = document.getElementById('clear-filters-btn');
            const clearFiltersContainer = document.getElementById('clear-filters-container');
            
            let allFetchedItems = []; 
            let featuredItem = null;
            let visibleItemsCount = 10;
            const itemsIncrement = 10;

            if (!pillsContainer || !latestItemsWrapper) {
                console.error('Pills container or items wrapper not found within the app.');
                if (latestItemsWrapper) latestItemsWrapper.innerHTML = '<p class="message-area error-message">Configuration error: essential containers not found.</p>';
                return;
            }

            // Fetches ALL data from the Squarespace collection, handling pagination
            async function fetchCollectionData(url) {
                let allItems = [];
                let currentUrl = url;

                try {
                    while (currentUrl) {
                        const response = await fetch(currentUrl);
                        if (!response.ok) throw new Error(`HTTP Error: ${response.status} - ${response.statusText} on URL: ${currentUrl}`);
                        const data = await response.json();
                        
                        if (data && data.items && data.items.length > 0) {
                            allItems = allItems.concat(data.items);
                        }

                        // Check for the next page URL in the pagination object
                        if (data.pagination && data.pagination.nextPageUrl) {
                            let nextPageUrl = data.pagination.nextPageUrl;
                            // Ensure the format parameter is on the next URL
                            if (!nextPageUrl.includes('format=json-pretty')) {
                                nextPageUrl += (nextPageUrl.includes('?') ? '&' : '?') + 'format=json-pretty';
                            }
                            currentUrl = nextPageUrl;
                        } else {
                            // No more pages
                            currentUrl = null;
                        }
                    }
                    return allItems;
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Error fetching collection data:', error);
                    latestItemsWrapper.innerHTML = `<p class="message-area error-message">Could not load articles. Detail: ${error.message}</p>`;
                    return null;
                }
            }

            // Formats a Unix timestamp to a readable date string (e.g., JUN 5, 2025)
            function formatDate(timestamp) {
                if (!timestamp) return '';
                try {
                    const date = new Date(timestamp);
                    return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { 
                        month: 'short', 
                        day: 'numeric', 
                        year: 'numeric' 
                    }).toUpperCase(); 
                } catch (e) {
                    console.warn("Could not format date from timestamp:", timestamp, e);
                    return ''; 
                }
            }
            
            // Decodes HTML entities from a string
            function decodeHtmlEntities(text) {
                const textArea = document.createElement('textarea');
                textArea.innerHTML = text;
                return textArea.value;
            }
            
            // Populates the year filter dropdown
            function populateYearFilter(items) {
                const years = new Set();
                items.forEach(item => {
                    const dateTimestamp = item.publishOn || item.addedOn || item.createdOn;
                    if (dateTimestamp) {
                        years.add(new Date(dateTimestamp).getFullYear());
                    }
                });
                
                const sortedYears = Array.from(years).sort((a, b) => b - a); // Newest first
                sortedYears.forEach(year => {
                    const option = document.createElement('option');
                    option.value = year;
                    option.textContent = year;
                    yearFilter.appendChild(option);
                });
            }

            function updateClearFiltersButtonVisibility() {
                const yearValue = yearFilter.value;
                const sortValue = sortFilter.value;
                const searchValue = searchInput.value;

                if (yearValue !== 'all' || sortValue !== 'newest' || searchValue !== '') {
                    clearFiltersContainer.style.display = 'block';
                } else {
                    clearFiltersContainer.style.display = 'none';
                }
            }

            function clearFilters() {
                yearFilter.value = 'all';
                sortFilter.value = 'newest';
                searchInput.value = '';
                visibleItemsCount = 10; // Reset pagination
                if (searchWrapper.classList.contains('active')) {
                    searchWrapper.classList.remove('active');
                }
                applyAllFilters();
            }


            // Applies all active filters and re-renders the list
            function applyAllFilters() {
                const activeCategoryPill = pillsContainer.querySelector('.category-pill.active-pill');
                updateClearFiltersButtonVisibility();

                let itemsToRender = [...allFetchedItems];
                
                if (activeCategoryPill && activeCategoryPill.dataset.category !== 'All') {
                    featuredItemWrapper.style.display = 'none';
                    dividerContainer.style.display = 'none';
                    latestPostsHeader.style.display = 'flex';

                    const selectedCategory = activeCategoryPill.dataset.category;
                    itemsToRender = itemsToRender.filter(item => {
                        const itemCategories = item.categories || [];
                        return itemCategories.includes(selectedCategory);
                    });
                } else { // "All" is selected or no pill is active
                    featuredItemWrapper.style.display = 'block';
                    dividerContainer.style.display = 'block';
                    latestPostsHeader.style.display = 'flex';
                    
                    featuredItemWrapper.innerHTML = '';
                    if (featuredItem) {
                        featuredItemWrapper.appendChild(createItemElement(featuredItem, true));
                        itemsToRender = itemsToRender.filter(item => item.id !== featuredItem.id);
                    }
                }
                
                const selectedYear = yearFilter.value;
                const selectedSort = sortFilter.value;
                const searchTerm = searchInput.value.toLowerCase();
                
                if (selectedYear !== 'all') {
                    itemsToRender = itemsToRender.filter(item => {
                        const dateTimestamp = item.publishOn || item.addedOn || item.createdOn;
                        return dateTimestamp && new Date(dateTimestamp).getFullYear().toString() === selectedYear;
                    });
                }
                
                if (searchTerm) {
                    itemsToRender = itemsToRender.filter(item => {
                        const title = (item.title || '').toLowerCase();
                        const excerpt = (item.excerpt || '').toLowerCase();
                        return title.includes(searchTerm) || excerpt.includes(searchTerm);
                    });
                }

                if (selectedSort === 'a-z') {
                    itemsToRender.sort((a, b) => (a.title || '').localeCompare(b.title || ''));
                } else if (selectedSort === 'z-a') {
                    itemsToRender.sort((a, b) => (b.title || '').localeCompare(a.title || ''));
                } else { // 'newest' is the default
                    itemsToRender.sort((a, b) => (b.publishOn || 0) - (a.publishOn || 0));
                }
                
                renderLatestPosts(itemsToRender);
            }

            function createItemElement(itemData, isFeatured) {
                // Main container
                const itemDiv = document.createElement('div');
                itemDiv.className = isFeatured ? 'summary-item featured-item' : 'summary-item';

                const itemCategories = itemData.categories && Array.isArray(itemData.categories) ? itemData.categories : [];
                if (itemCategories.length > 0) {
                    itemDiv.dataset.categories = itemCategories.join(',');
                }
                const firstCategory = itemCategories.length > 0 ? itemCategories[0].toUpperCase() : '';

                // Determine the correct link. Prioritize sourceUrl, then fullUrl.
                const finalLink = itemData.sourceUrl ? itemData.sourceUrl : (itemData.fullUrl ? itemData.fullUrl : '#');

                // --- Image Column ---
                let imageUrl = itemData.assetUrl || itemData.imageUrl || (itemData.media && Array.isArray(itemData.media) && itemData.media.length > 0 && itemData.media[0].assetUrl) || null;
                const placeholderWidth = isFeatured ? 1060 : 350;
                const placeholderHeight = isFeatured ? 675 : 190;
                const placeholderText = "Image Unavailable";
                const placeholderBgColor = "cccccc";
                const placeholderTextColor = "666666";
                const placeholderUrl = `https://placehold.co/${placeholderWidth}x${placeholderHeight}/${placeholderBgColor}/${placeholderTextColor}?text=${placeholderText}&font=inter`;

                const imageLink = document.createElement('a');
                imageLink.href = finalLink;
                imageLink.target = '_blank';
                imageLink.className = 'summary-item-image-column';
                
                const imageContainer = document.createElement('div');
                imageContainer.className = 'item-image-container';

                const image = document.createElement('img');
                image.src = imageUrl || placeholderUrl;
                image.alt = itemData.title || 'Article image';
                image.className = 'item-image';
                image.onerror = function() { this.onerror=null; this.src=placeholderUrl; };

                imageContainer.appendChild(image);
                imageLink.appendChild(imageContainer);

                // --- Text Column ---
                const textColumn = document.createElement('div');
                textColumn.className = 'summary-item-text-column';

                // Meta Info
                let dateString = '';
                const dateTimestamp = itemData.publishOn || itemData.addedOn || itemData.createdOn;
                if (dateTimestamp) {
                    dateString = formatDate(dateTimestamp);
                }
                const metaInfo = document.createElement('p');
                metaInfo.className = 'item-meta-info';
                
                const metaDate = document.createElement('span');
                metaDate.className = 'meta-date';
                metaDate.textContent = dateString;
                metaInfo.appendChild(metaDate);

                if (firstCategory) {
                    metaInfo.append(` / `);
                    const metaCategory = document.createElement('span');
                    metaCategory.className = 'meta-category';
                    metaCategory.textContent = firstCategory;
                    metaInfo.appendChild(metaCategory);
                }
                textColumn.appendChild(metaInfo);

                // Title
                const titleHeader = document.createElement('h3');
                titleHeader.className = 'item-title';
                const titleLink = document.createElement('a');
                titleLink.href = finalLink;
                titleLink.target = '_blank';
                titleLink.className = 'item-title-link';
                titleLink.textContent = decodeHtmlEntities(itemData.title || 'Untitled');
                titleHeader.appendChild(titleLink);
                textColumn.appendChild(titleHeader);

                // Excerpt
                if (itemData.excerpt) {
                    const excerptDiv = document.createElement('div');
                    excerptDiv.className = 'item-excerpt';
                    // Use innerHTML to correctly render the HTML content from the excerpt
                    excerptDiv.innerHTML = itemData.excerpt;
                    textColumn.appendChild(excerptDiv);
                }

                // Read More
                if (itemData.fullUrl) {
                    const readMoreLinkEl = document.createElement('a');
                    readMoreLinkEl.href = finalLink;
                    readMoreLinkEl.className = 'read-more-link';
                    readMoreLinkEl.target = '_blank';
                    readMoreLinkEl.append('Read More ');
                    const arrowSpan = document.createElement('span');
                    arrowSpan.className = 'arrow';
                    arrowSpan.innerHTML = '<svg fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M5 12h14"></path><path d="M12 5l7 7-7 7"></path></svg>';
                    readMoreLinkEl.appendChild(arrowSpan);
                    textColumn.appendChild(readMoreLinkEl);
                }

                // --- Assemble ---
                if (isFeatured) {
                    itemDiv.appendChild(imageLink);
                    itemDiv.appendChild(textColumn);
                } else {
                    itemDiv.appendChild(textColumn);
                    itemDiv.appendChild(imageLink);
                }

                return itemDiv;
            }

            function renderLatestPosts(itemsToRender) {
                latestItemsWrapper.innerHTML = '';
                seeMoreContainer.innerHTML = '';

                if (itemsToRender.length === 0) {
                    latestItemsWrapper.innerHTML = '<p class="message-area no-articles-message">No articles found matching your criteria.</p>';
                    return;
                }
                
                const itemsToShow = itemsToRender.slice(0, visibleItemsCount);
                itemsToShow.forEach((itemData) => { 
                    latestItemsWrapper.appendChild(createItemElement(itemData, false));
                });

                if (itemsToRender.length > visibleItemsCount) {
                    const seeMoreBtn = document.createElement('button');
                    seeMoreBtn.id = 'see-more-btn';
                    seeMoreBtn.append('See More ');
                    const arrowSpan = document.createElement('span');
                    arrowSpan.className = 'arrow';
                    arrowSpan.innerHTML = '<svg fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M5 12h14"></path><path d="M12 5l7 7-7 7"></path></svg>';
                    seeMoreBtn.appendChild(arrowSpan);
                    seeMoreBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                        const currentItemCount = visibleItemsCount;
                        visibleItemsCount += itemsIncrement;
                        const newItems = itemsToRender.slice(currentItemCount, visibleItemsCount);
                        newItems.forEach(itemData => {
                            latestItemsWrapper.appendChild(createItemElement(itemData, false));
                        });
                        if (itemsToRender.length <= visibleItemsCount) {
                            seeMoreContainer.innerHTML = '';
                        }
                    });
                    seeMoreContainer.appendChild(seeMoreBtn);
                }
            }
            
            // Extracts and filters categories based on the allowed list
            function extractCategoriesFromData(itemsData, allowedCategories = []) {
                const categories = new Set();
                if (!itemsData || allowedCategories.length === 0) return []; 

                itemsData.forEach(item => {
                    if (item.categories && Array.isArray(item.categories)) {
                        item.categories.forEach(categoryName => {
                            const trimmedCategoryName = categoryName.trim();
                            if (allowedCategories.includes(trimmedCategoryName)) {
                                categories.add(trimmedCategoryName);
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });
                return allowedCategories.filter(cat => categories.has(cat));
            }

            // Creates a single category pill button
            function createPill(categoryName) {
                const pill = document.createElement('button');
                pill.textContent = categoryName;
                pill.className = 'category-pill';
                pill.dataset.category = categoryName; 
                pill.addEventListener('click', function () { 
                    visibleItemsCount = 10; // Reset pagination on category change
                    if(this.classList.contains('active-pill') && this.dataset.category !== 'All') {
                        this.classList.remove('active-pill');
                        pillsContainer.querySelector('[data-category="All"]').classList.add('active-pill');
                    } else {
                        appContainer.querySelectorAll('#category-filter-pills-container button').forEach(p => p.classList.remove('active-pill'));
                        this.classList.add('active-pill');
                    }
                    clearFilters();
                });
                return pill;
            }
            
            // Sets up the category pills in the DOM
            function setupPills(categoriesToDisplay) {
                pillsContainer.innerHTML = ''; 
                
                const allPill = createPill('All');
                allPill.classList.add('active-pill');
                pillsContainer.appendChild(allPill);

                if (categoriesToDisplay.length === 0) {
                    pillsContainer.innerHTML = '<p class="no-categories-message">No categories selected for display or none found.</p>';
                    return false; 
                }
                categoriesToDisplay.forEach(category => pillsContainer.appendChild(createPill(category)));
                return true; 
            }

            // Initialization function
            (async function init() {
                allFetchedItems = await fetchCollectionData(squarespaceCollectionUrl);
                if (allFetchedItems) {
                    allFetchedItems.sort((a, b) => (b.publishOn || 0) - (a.publishOn || 0));

                    const featuredIndex = allFetchedItems.findIndex(item => item.fullUrl && item.fullUrl.endsWith(featuredPublicationUrl));
                    if(featuredIndex > -1){
                        featuredItem = allFetchedItems[featuredIndex];
                    }

                    populateYearFilter(allFetchedItems);
                    const categoriesToSetup = extractCategoriesFromData(allFetchedItems, visibleCategories);
                    setupPills(categoriesToSetup);
                    
                    applyAllFilters();
                    
                    // Add event listeners for new filters
                    yearFilter.addEventListener('change', () => { visibleItemsCount = 10; applyAllFilters(); });
                    sortFilter.addEventListener('change', () => { visibleItemsCount = 10; applyAllFilters(); });
                    searchInput.addEventListener('input', () => { visibleItemsCount = 10; applyAllFilters(); });
                    clearFiltersBtn.addEventListener('click', clearFilters);
                    
                    // Search interaction logic
                    if(searchLabel) {
                        searchLabel.parentElement.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                            if (e.target === searchLabel || searchLabel.contains(e.target)) {
                                searchWrapper.classList.add('active');
                                searchInput.focus();
                            }
                        });
                    }
                    if(searchInput) {
                        searchInput.addEventListener('blur', () => {
                            if (searchInput.value === '') {
                                searchWrapper.classList.remove('active');
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            })();
        });
    </script>
</body>
